instance_template: cpu("FalconX"; "CoreZen"; "EcoMini"). cost("FalconX", 600; "CoreZen", 500; "EcoMini", 300). perf("FalconX", 125; "CoreZen", 115; "EcoMini", 90). gpu("TitanZ"; "MidlineGT"; "Pixie"). cost("TitanZ", 700; "MidlineGT", 500; "Pixie", 400). perf("TitanZ", 135; "MidlineGT", 100; "Pixie", 95). drive("FlashNova"; "Terabox"; "BudgetDisk"). cost("FlashNova", 250; "Terabox", 300; "BudgetDisk", 150). perf("FlashNova", 110; "Terabox", 100; "BudgetDisk", 60).
generator: 1 { selected_cpu(C) : cpu(C) } 1. 1 { selected_gpu(G) : gpu(G) } 1. 1 { selected_drive(D) : drive(D) } 1.

hard_constraints.description: Compliance policy requires that the component identifying as the median performance tier must also represent the minimum fiscal expenditure among the selected hardware.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: selected(X) :- selected_cpu(X). selected(X) :- selected_gpu(X). selected(X) :- selected_drive(X). max_perf(P) :- P = #max {V : perf(X, V), selected(X)}. min_perf(P) :- P = #min {V : perf(X, V), selected(X)}. mid_component(X) :- selected(X), perf(X, P), not min_perf(P), not max_perf(P). cheapest(X) :- cost(X, C), selected(X), C = #min {C1 : cost(X1, C1), selected(X1)}. :- mid_component(X1), cheapest(X2), X1 != X2.

hard_constraints.description: Our procurement rules prohibit pairing high-cost CPUs (exceeding $500) with the Pixie GPU model to maintain configuration standards.
To ensure system stability and performance compliance, the spread between the highest and lowest performance benchmarks must not exceed 50 points.
Standard operating policy mandates that utilizing the FlashNova drive requires a GPU that meets or exceeds a performance score of 100.
Budgetary rules state that exactly two components within the build must fall into the price bracket exceeding $300.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- N != 2, N = #count {X : selected(X), cost(X, V), V > 300}.

hard_constraints.description: Internal technical specifications require the GPU to be positioned as the mid-performance component, situated strictly between the CPU and the drive.
